# Directors
<div style="clear: both;"></div>
<br>
The Director of Finance & Operations oversees finances, grant management, institutional relationships, and coordination between the Executive Board and the field.<br>
The Country Director heads all operations on the ground in Kananga and serves as the organization’s legal representative in the D.R. Congo.
